author: Animalogic
description:
This horror parasites take over a snail's braaaaaiinns and turn them into a billoard saying, "I'm delicious, eat me!" It's a convoluted way for the parasite to get to its ultimate location: the guts of a bird. This is the sci-fi life of the green-banded broodsac worm.
